title: A video showing the alternate right-wing group participating in the Trump Greetings
subtitle: :: Video clips of a meeting of the National Policy Institute, a white group of right-wing fanatics/watchmen, which shows Richard Spencer as he leads a Nazi greeting.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Members of the alternate right-wing group, the National Policy Institute, can be seen on a video to pay a tribute like the Nazis, as spoke by Richard Spencer, "Hail Trump, salute our people, salute the victory!"
